title: [Bug]: Just a moment while we get things ready (Forever)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

I open Teams, Select my clients Domain, and get the eternal message.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS,  Latest Edge 1.12.7 & Latest Stable

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Launch Teams
2.Select PrideGroup (Client Domain)
3.Watch The Spinner For An Eternity
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.Open Teams Interface and allow me to communicate with my client
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context
